dc_description_s: Apollo, Armstrong County, Pennsylvania, Sept. 1904. 1 map on 6 sheets : col. ; on sheets 64 x 54 cm.; Statement of responsibility: Sanborn Map Company.  Partial cadastral map.  Title from sheet 1.  Copyright, 1904 by the Sanborn Map Company.""  Oriented with north to the upper right on some sheets.  ""September 1904.""  ""EMR 9-21-04""--lower right corner of sheet 1.  Includes key, sheet index map, streets and ""Specials"" indexes, notes, and text."". Scale approximately 1:600. 50 ft. to an in.
